Start with the painful status quo, then intensify it with a consequence that creates urgency to keep reading.
Most coaches post daily and still hear crickets. Here’s the brutal reason no one told you.
Challenge a common belief with a bold reversal that signals you are about to reveal a better path forward.
The worst advice in coaching? “Nurture every lead.” Here’s why that’s killing your pipeline.
Lead with a specific metric or contrast that reframes the opportunity or risk in unmistakable numbers.
87% of our inbound leads ghosted… until we changed one sentence in our opener.
Offer a vulnerable admission or mistake that earns trust, then hint at the transformation you unlocked.
I almost shut down my practice last year. The fix took 12 minutes a week.
Expose a beloved industry myth, then tease the unexpected truth that flips the audience’s worldview.
“Add more value” is not why prospects ignore you. This is.
Compress a before→after story into two lines that prove you can create the transformation your audience craves.
Session 1: 14% close rate. Session 6: 61%. Same offer. Different first sentence.

sanctum.description: Cookie-based session authentication using Laravel Sanctum via content_session cookie. For non-GET requests, fetch /sanctum/csrf-cookie and include X-XSRF-TOKEN header.
sanctum.name: content_session
